get.summary: Retrieve persisted per API logging data.
get.description: This retrieve the persisted API logging data for API logging support.
This retrieve the persisted correlation configs data for updating correlation logs.

200.description: An array of correlation component configs

isDefaultVersion.description: Whether this is the default version of the API.

groupIds.description: group ids associated with the application.

tokenType.description: The type of the tokens to be used (exchanged or without exchanged). Accepted values are EXCHANGED, DIRECT or BOTH.

appID.description: The application ID of the subscription.

graphQLMaxComplexity.description: Maximum Complexity of the GraphQL query

graphQLMaxDepth.description: Maximum Depth of the GraphQL query

next.description:
Link to the next subset of resources qualified.
Empty if no more resources are to be returned.

previous.description:
Link to the previous subset of resources qualified.
Empty if current subset is the first subset returned.

timeUnit.description: Unit of the time. Allowed values are "sec", "min", "hour", "day"

unitTime.description: Time limit that the throttling limit applies.

dataAmount.description: Amount of data allowed to be transfered

dataUnit.description: Unit of data allowed to be transfered. Allowed values are "KB", "MB" and "GB"
